job_tasks.phrase: leverage AI to craft intelligent, forward-thinking solutions to bring our 100+ product portfolio into the modern world
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates understanding the business goal of modernizing the product portfolio and using AI to achieve it.

job_tasks.phrase: At Trilogy's core, we have a strategic product line reshaping industries and how people work and learn.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the core business strategy and impact of the company's products.

job_tasks.phrase: Embark on a generative AI journey
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions generative AI, which is a form of modeling.
Indicates the use of AI models to drive product improvements.
This points to software development for integration and connectivity.

job_tasks.phrase: craft unique user experiences, optimize advocate activities
job_tasks.justification: This describes software development activities to enhance user experience and optimize platform features.

job_tasks.phrase: offering actionable insights and a holistic customer view that propels customer satisfaction and loyalty to new heights.
job_tasks.justification: This implies developing software features that provide insights and improve customer views.

job_tasks.phrase: integrating AI-driven solutions into these exciting product lines
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on integrating AI as a component within existing software products.
Directly refers to software application development using specific architectural patterns.

job_tasks.phrase: Leverage cutting-edge AI tools to improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.
job_tasks.justification: This describes using AI as tools within the software development lifecycle, not necessarily building the AI models themselves.

job_tasks.phrase: Modernize our strategic product lines through AI-driven innovations, enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement.
job_tasks.justification: This relates to improving existing software products using AI, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies, focusing on creating robust, cloud-native applications.
job_tasks.justification: This is a core software development task involving backend and cloud-native application development.
A standard software development practice for quality assurance.

job_tasks.phrase: Enhance product functionality and effectively integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services.
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on integrating AI into existing products and services, a software development task.
This is a use case of AI to assist in the software development process.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with a skilled, diverse global team of tech experts.
navigate the complexities of integrating AI-driven solutions

classification.rationale: The role focuses on leveraging AI tools to enhance existing products and software development processes, rather than designing, fine-tuning, or deploying generative models. While generative AI is mentioned, the core responsibilities are about software development and integrating AI assistance, not core GenAI engineering.
